entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow us to style the components-reconnect-modal in Blazor #60546
  • OkHttp connections are not properly stopped when the HubConnection is stopped #60543
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2 deployment issues after installing .NET 9 runtime on server #60541

    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Dictionary expressions: include collection arguments #9162

Merged

  • Extensions: Add details on open issue for candidate pruning #9164
  • Write docs platform requirements for the new extensions #9133
  • Clarify partial event attribute targets #9150

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling .ToListAsync(), .CountAsync(), etc is allowed on any IQueryable instead of only EF Core Queryables #35666
  • Sensitive Data Logging causes NullReferenceException hiding real issue #35665
  • EF selects wrong data #35663
    10.0.0

Closed

  • How to use DatabaseGenerated DateTime value with InMemory provider? #35664

PullRequests

Updated

  • Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35617

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature] `SecureStorage.GetOrSetAsync(key, value?)` #27966
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27962
  • [Windows, Android] Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically is not working #27959
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker control Focused and Unfocused events does not trigger whether focusing manually or programmatically. #27957
  • [iOS, Catalyst] ScrollPosition changes when updating the ItemsLayout from Grid to Linear layout in CV1 #27955
  • HybridWebView throwing exceptions in Windows even with simplest configuration (causing crashes) #27954
  • HybridWebView crashing every time in Windows now with 8.0.40 update #27953
  • [Android] Layout was hidden when the keyboard appeared for the below ScrollView's Entry content. #27952
  • [Android] Keyboard covers content at bottom of screen in a ScrollView #27951
  • [Windows] RightToLeft is not working for Shell #27947
  • [Windows] CollectionView ItemsLayout does not update while switch from LinearItemsLayout to GridItemsLayout #27946
  • .NET MAUI IOS Collection view selection colour is Grey when we navigate to other page and come back again. #27945
  • new Couchbase.Lite.Database() throws an DllNotFoundException when built for iOS Release target #27944
  • HybridWebView can not load .js.map file. #27943

Closed

  • Selective Exception breakpoints do not work properly #27934
  • Firing OnNavigating is blocked when using extended TabBar (tabbar with more than 5 tabs) (iOS) #27964
  • Maui ios device theme vice splashscreen background #27909
    Backlog
  • Splash screen image is not displayed after installation. #20005
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Move more runs to Sequoia #27972
    area-infrastructure
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #27970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #27967
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27963
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27961
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview1] Update more preview1 versions #27956
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview1
  • Enable nullability annotations for `ShadowTypeConverter` #27950
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed an issue where an Editor with a small height inside a ScrollView would cause the entire page to scroll #27948
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Android] Testcase for Shell FlowDirection issue #27931
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Remove conditions for devdiv #27958
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27942
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview1] Update sdk and aspnet versions #27926
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
    area-architecture
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload - Handle fingerprint when hot reloading scoped CSS bundles #27788
    area-tooling
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20250219211456120 to main #27915
    area-localization, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR5

    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MemberNotNullWhen does not work with inheritance #77313

Closed

  • csharp_style_prefer_primary_constructors = false:error does not enforce showing primary constructors as errors #77308
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35820.234 #77307
  • IDE0059 incorrectly triggers when assigning to the indexer of a value type #77258

PullRequests

Created

  • Support IsActiveDocument in RoslynCodeSearchResult #77311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle ModuleCancellationTokenExpression in AbstractFlow visitor #77310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Null annotate MetadataHelpers #77309
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implemented IVsEditorFactoryChooser on AbstractEditorFactory class to invoke WinForms designer editor factory directly by VS Shell #77306
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce the number of nodes that are walked during import completion commit. #77305
    VSCode

Merged

  • disable the WPF ComboBox Search behavior in Rename popup #77312
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Flesh out handling of symbols synthesized during lowering of extension methods #77287
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: include receiver parameter in display string #77283
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add Copilot UI prototype to Semantic Search window #77222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Add test demonstrating issue. #77290
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix false positive 'Unnecessary assignment of a value' #77297
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Partial events and constructors: more tests #77280
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Disable realtime monitoring in the official pipeline #77302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Generate Documentation Auto-Insert #76665
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Change override completion to select text after updating the buffer. #76983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Method [draft] #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make razor generator always run: #77304
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make diagnostic checksum computation into an extension method. #77277
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Razor EA #77194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SPMI should diff unwind info #112807
    Future
  • Telemetry Baggage proposal #112803
    Future
  • HttpHandlerDiagnosticListener might emit `HttpRequestOut.Start` 2 times for certain hosts with ActivityIdFormat.W3C #112792
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add EditDistance (Levenshtein) to TensorPrimitives for unEqual length <T> comparision. #112784
  • System.IO.Packaging should perform case-insensitive matching when determining part media types #112783
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Tensor Operators #112781
  • ArrayPool<T>.Shared returned null #112778
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49826/test49826/test49826.cmd #112773
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NativeClients/Dispatch/Dispatch.cmd #112772

Closed

  • Serialising an object with a JsonObject or Dictionary property does not respect JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull #112785
  • Host.TryExecuteBackgroundServiceAsync logic #112600
  • DeflateStream does not return a filled buffer when it hits the end of an inflater block, and BufferedStream doesn't keep requesting until it is full #112673
  • JIT: Missed optimization for integer `x / y; x % y` #112774
  • Add Cancellation capability to PropertyChangingEventArgs #21624
  • Exposing plumbing for single instance application #35827
  • [8.0][linux-s390x] Build failure in hostpolicy #112435
  • Creating Property of Generic Type fails when creating an Assembly using Reflection.Emit and MetadataLoadContext. #112155
    10.0.0
  • Repo build using checked runtime fails with JIT asserts #112635
    10.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Stack Overflow when appending modifiers to TypeInfoResolverChain #112735
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Random.Get{Hex}String #111956
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConditionalWeakTable<TKey,TValue>.Remove overload #111925
    Future
  • Can not build dotnet runtime due to 404 error while installing dotnet sdk v10.0.100-alpha.1.25077.2 #112739
  • X509Store.Add Fails On Ubuntu 22.04 in FIPS Mode #111560
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure 3DES Exports are actually 3DES on all versions of Windows #112806
    area-System.Security
  • [workloads] Bump net10 downlevel versions to n-1 #112805
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove unused file Interop.PFXExportCertStore.cs #112801
    area-System.Security
  • Fix JsonNode.DeepEquals #112800
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix the unwind opcode for new APX registers #112799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `Monitor.Wait` unregistration in CoreCLR upon a thread exiting #112797
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move local thread pool work items to global by default when blocking on a task #112796
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [8.0] Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112795
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • [9.0] Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112794
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.x
  • Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112793
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.x
  • [8.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112790
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112789
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Pass SourceBuiltPdbArtifactsDir parameteres to runtime build #112788
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] add and load empty ES6 module dotnet.diag.js when FeaturePerfTracing #112787

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Class library doesn't imports NativeFileReference items #47016
  • dotnet format doesn't write to disk after updating to dotnet SDK 9.0.200 #47012
  • Absolute or relative paths to .sln no longer works with `dotnet sln add` #47008
  • dotnet publish: AfterTargets="AfterPublish" triggers before publish is complete #46999

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore .lutconfig files via .gitignore #47029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip Flakey GivenDotnetTest Tests #47024
    Area-dotnet test, Test Debt
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.3xx] Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #47021
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Fix branch trigger for CI builds #47018
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix SDKBundleVersion calculation #47017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2647424 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix branch trigger for CI builds #47019
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Don't reference windowsdesktop from sdk when building source-only #47011
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #46977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make DefineStaticWebAssets incremental #46920
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Branch Lockdown
  • Minor clean-up in src/Layout/redist #46994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
